<h4>FORMAT.callType: GET/DELETE/POST/PUT=> The types of calls handled at this endpoint, followed by the description
<h4>FORMAT.params: PARAMS=> 'expected name' : expected type, ['optional param name' : optional param type]
<h4>FORMAT.format: RETURNED=> Fromat expected to be returned from a GET request
<h4>FORMAT.wip params: WIP PARAMS=> Work in progress parameters. Not currently availible

/cal_data.descript: GET=> Returns events in a json format based on the parameters passed in. Time is in hhmm format. Date is in any valid format found here. Cookies return the proper group calendar

/create_account.descript: POST=> Creates a new account. Takes an email, hashed password, name, current year (1-5, 5 is staff), student leader status, and gender.
/create_account.format: RETURNED=> 403 error if an account already exists with the given email, or missing params

/delete_account.descript: DELETE=> Deletes an existing account. Takes an email and a hashed password as well as requiring valid session and email cookies
/delete_account.format: RETURNED=> 403 error if missing cookies, params are invalid, or cookies are invalid

/get_user_data [DEPRECATED].descript: GET=> Downloads an excel file with the user data. Requester must have valid cookies, have a validated account, and be an admin.
/get_user_data [DEPRECATED].format: RETURNED=> 403 error if an account already exists with the given email

/logout.descript: DELETE=> Deletes the current session as well as the browser's cookies. There must be seshId and email cookie.

/end_all_sessions [WIP].descript: DELETE=> Deletes all sessions. There must be an email cookie.

/login [WIP].descript: GET=> Takes an email and a hashed password.
/login [WIP].format: RETURNED=> 403 Error if not successful, or missing parameters

/orders.descript: GET=> Endpoint used for testing purposes only. Contact Wyatt to have this set up for your own testing.

/validate_account.descript: PUT=> Changes status of account to validated

/verifyUserInfo.descript: GET=> Requires an validated admin account cookies. Returns a JSON of user data [{'name' : '', 'year' : '', 'gender' : '', 'sl' : ''},{...}]
/verifyUserInfo.format: RETURNED=> 403 error if missing cookies, params are invalid, or cookies are invalid
/verifyUserInfo.descript2: PUT=> Requires an validated admin account cookies as well as a JSON of user data [{'name' : '', 'year' : '', 'gender' : '', 'sl' : ''},{...}]. Updates server's database with new data
/verifyUserInfo.format2: RETURNED=> 403 error if missing cookies, params are invalid, or cookies are invalid
